observation: IC Flow Controls, Inc. - Your competent partner for Fluid Technology - icflow.com  News Open submenu Products Applications Service Company Contact Close submenu Company News Exhibitions VSE flow meters Beinlich pumps DST magnetic systems HBE hydraulic components Oleotec check couplings Rotary Power C Range pump Rötelmann ball valves System solutions Downloads VSE software DST inquiry forms HBE calculation software 3D animation About us e.holding company group Skip navigation search Navigation Company group Your browser does not support the video tag. I suggest you upgrade your browser. Get to know IC Flow We have news for you Have a look at our catalogs Find out more about our products Solutions for fluid technology Pumps, flow meters, magnetic systems, hydraulic components “IC Flow Controls, Inc. is a division of the expansive German e.holding Fluid Technology Group. We are your reliable partner in North America both for standard devices and for customer-specific solutions according to client requirements.“ IC Flow Controls offers the complete product range of the five e.holding companies for the most diverse of industry sectors including fluid, drive, measurement and process technology. We provide VSE precision flow meters, Beinlich performance pumps, DST magnetic couplings and HBE hydraulic components. Additionally, we offer the pumps and ball valves of the e.holding partner companies Rotary Power and Rötelmann. We are based in Normal, Illinois with regional sales offices throughout the U.S. We provide personal and competent consultations, perfect on-site service, quality support and application expertise. Our clients benefit from our technical knowhow and short development and delivery intervals. Working closely with our clients from the initial project development helps us streamline the design, assembly and commissioning processes to follow. Latest news Precise extraction with the CANNA.pump The CANNA.pump Read more … HBE expands oil air cooler series ACI: Efficient cooling with ACIP and ACM HBE has expanded its portfolio of oil air coolers and now offers two innovative models that increase efficiency in various industrial and mobile hydraulic applications. These new products are the ACIP partial flow cooler and the ACM oil air cooler for mobile applications. Every drop electrifying – VSE flow meters and Beinlich pumps in the production of electric motors The progressive development of electric mobility requires ever more efficient and reliable technologies for the production of electric motors. In this context, the trickle impregnation process takes a significant part in production as an important process step. This process provides protection for the windings of electric motors through uniform and controlled impregnation with insulating materials, which in turn increases the performance and longevity of the motors. © 2024 IC Flow Controls, Inc.
